original_text: So the Israelites did as the Lord had told them. They gave to the Levites towns to live in and land for their animals. They gave these from their own land.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와의 명령을 따라 자기의 기업에서 이 성읍들과 그 목초지들을 레위 사람에게 주니라

sentences.original_text: So the Israelites did as the Lord had told them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이스라엘 사람들은 주님께서 그들에게 말씀하신 대로 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They gave to the Levites towns to live in
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 레위 사람들에게 살 도시들을 주었고

sentences.original_text: They gave these from their own land.
